name: Crypto Village Accelerator
public_notice: CVA will undergo 500,000,000:1 swap to CVAG. https://support.probit.com/hc/en-us/articles/4403575712537-Crypto-Village-Accelerator-CVA-Token-Swap-Will-Be-Supported-on-ProBit-Global

description.en:
Crypto Village Accelerator is the first global accelerator of blockchain projects created for providing investors with a system of protection and financial growth and for providing the best projects with a prime channel aimed at raising capital and quickly reaching the target market.
Crypto Village Accelerator (CVA) token is a digital asset created by the company that manages www.cryptovillageaccelerator.com
Owners can earn 6% to 10% per month thanks to our special staking or can use it in the CRYPTO VILLAGE ACCELERATOR ecosystem
